BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTFS_HEADCONFIG_MST T SET T.STR_BUDGET_YEAR=?, T.STR_CLASSIFICATION_CODE=?,T.STR_GRANT_TYPE_CODE=?,T.STR_BUD_TYPE_CODE=?,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,T.STR_DIVISION_CODE=?,T.STR_SUBDIVISION_CODE=?,T.STR_SCHEME_CODE=?,T.STR_PROJECT_CODE=?,T.STR_MJR_HD_CODE=?,T.STR_SUBMJR_HD_CODE=?,T.STR_MNR_HD_CODE=?,T.STR_SBMNR_HD_CODE=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where T.NUM_HEAD_CONFIG_ID=? and T.GNUM_hospital_code=?
update ACTFS_HEADCONFIG_MST T set T.GNUM_ISVALID=0,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID = ? where NUM_HEAD_CONFIG_ID =? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
